name: The Death of a Cube
description:
This game was created for the Newbies 2 game jam.

The Death of a Cube

You are the Cube, a legendary hero.

After the last battle you were taken prisoner by the evil Spheres. They have trapped you within force fields, which stop any living thing from escaping.

However, you have discovered a way to escape: YOU MUST DIE. This will allow you to slip through the field before you can be resurrected.

Credits can be found in game.
